casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Demarcus Trevell YOUNG, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156538
COA: 337986 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 29, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the July 31, 2017 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because the defendant has failed to meet the burden of establishing entitlement to relief under MCR 6.508(D). The motion to amend is DENIED.
